overview: "How is it that we are still here? How come they're already almost printing human organs and we're still discussing gender equality? How come they already deliver fast food to homes on hangover days and racism is still such a big issue? Why is more spent on Social Security than on travel? And is there an afterlife, on social media (where it really matters)?" It is from these questions, at a time when the world is amazed by the evolution of times, that Diogo Faro starts to construct the text that will try to demystify the doubts in the comedian's head.
title: Diogo Faro - Strange Place
